# Improving dashboard UX for user-friendliness (2025-12-23 22:56Z)

_**User (2025-12-23 22:58Z)**_

Check current dashboard and suggest changes how to make it more UX friendly. Ask any questions that would help you

---

_**Agent (model copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5)**_

Looking at your dashboard, I can see it's functional but could be more user-friendly. Before I suggest specific changes, let me ask a few questions to better understand your users and workflows:

## Questions to Help Me Suggest Better UX

1. **Primary Users**: Who uses this dashboard most often?
   - Are they cottage staff, managers, or owners?
   - What's their technical comfort level?
   - Do they switch between tasks frequently or focus on one area?

2. **Most Common Tasks**: What are the 3-5 most frequent daily operations?
   - For example: checking bookings, adding orders, managing stock, etc.
   - Which features are rarely used?

3. **Task Relationships**: How do tasks typically flow?
   - For example: Do users often go Bookings → Orders → Payments?
   - Are there common task sequences?

4. **Access Patterns**:
   - Is this accessed on desktop, tablet, or mobile?
   - Do staff use it while moving around (at the bar, reception)?

5. **Current Pain Points**: What frustrations do users have?
   - Too many clicks to common features?
   - Hard to find specific functions?
   - Confusion about what to use when?

## Initial Observations & Quick Wins

Even without your answers, here are some immediate UX improvements I notice:

1. **Visual Hierarchy**: All 19 cards look identical - no way to distinguish critical vs. occasional tasks
2. **Cognitive Load**: Too many options at once without grouping or priority
3. **Navigation**: "Back to Menu" button unclear (what's the menu?)
4. **Search/Filter**: No way to quickly find a specific function
5. **Color Usage**: Colors are decorative but don't convey meaning
6. **Grouping**: Categories exist but aren't visually separated enough

Would you like me to:
- **Option A**: Suggest improvements based on common hospitality workflows
- **Option B**: Wait for your answers and create a tailored solution
- **Option C**: Show you multiple dashboard layout alternatives to choose from

What would be most helpful?

---

_**User (2025-12-23 23:03Z)**_

1. owners, technical comfort level is high, focus on one area
2. bookings, products and prices management, meal planner, then the rest
3. the most common flow is from products to prices
4. mostly on tablet, sometimes on pc, not often on mobile
5. too many cards now and it is confusing and hard to find features
OPTION C, show me multiple layout alternatives and take my answers into account

---

_**Agent (model copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5)**_

Based on your answers, here are **3 dashboard layout alternatives** tailored to your workflow:

---

## Option 1: **Priority-Based with Quick Actions**
Most frequent tasks front and center, rest categorized and collapsed.

````elixir
defmodule CozyCheckoutWeb.DashboardLive do
  use CozyCheckoutWeb, :live_view

  def mount(_params, _session, socket) do
    {:ok,
     socket
     |> assign(:expanded_sections, %{
       "catalog" => false,
       "inventory" => false,
       "sales" => false,
       "other" => false
     })}
  end

  def handle_event("toggle_section", %{"section" => section}, socket) do
    expanded = socket.assigns.expanded_sections
    {:noreply, assign(socket, :expanded_sections, Map.update!(expanded, section, &(!&1)))}
  end

  def render(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <div class="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-indigo-100">
      <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <%!-- Header --%>
        <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
          <div>
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Admin Dashboard</h1>
            <p class="text-lg text-gray-600">Jindřichův dům Management</p>
          </div>
          <.link
            navigate={~p"/"}
            class="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
          >
            <.icon name="hero-arrow-left" class="w-4 h-4" /> Back
          </.link>
        </div>

        <%!-- Quick Actions (Most Used) --%>
        <div class="mb-8">
          <h2 class="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wide mb-4">
            Quick Actions
          </h2>
          <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
            <.quick_action_card
              title="Bookings"
              icon="hero-calendar-days"
              navigate={~p"/admin/bookings"}
              color="rose"
            />
            <.quick_action_card
              title="Products"
              icon="hero-cube"
              navigate={~p"/admin/products"}
              color="indigo"
            />
            <.quick_action_card
              title="Pricelists"
              icon="hero-currency-dollar"
              navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists"}
              color="green"
            />
            <.quick_action_card
              title="Meal Planner"
              icon="hero-clipboard-document-list"
              navigate={~p"/admin/meal-planner"}
              color="amber"
            />
          </div>
        </div>

        <%!-- Expandable Sections --%>
        <div class="space-y-4">
          <%!-- Catalog Management --%>
          <.expandable_section
            title="Catalog & Pricing"
            section="catalog"
            expanded={@expanded_sections["catalog"]}
            count={5}
          >
            <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-3 pt-4">
              <.compact_card
                title="Categories"
                icon="hero-tag"
                navigate={~p"/admin/categories"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Products"
                icon="hero-cube"
                navigate={~p"/admin/products"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Pricelists"
                icon="hero-currency-dollar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Price Management"
                icon="hero-chart-bar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists/management"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Print Pricelist"
                icon="hero-printer"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists/print"}
              />
            </div>
          </.expandable_section>

          <%!-- Inventory --%>
          <.expandable_section
            title="Inventory & Stock"
            section="inventory"
            expanded={@expanded_sections["inventory"]}
            count={4}
          >
            <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-3 pt-4">
              <.compact_card
                title="Purchase Orders"
                icon="hero-archive-box"
                navigate={~p"/admin/purchase_orders"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Stock Overview"
                icon="hero-chart-bar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/stock"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Stock Adjustments"
                icon="hero-adjustments-horizontal"
                navigate={~p"/admin/stock-adjustments"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Inventory Reports"
                icon="hero-chart-pie"
                navigate={~p"/admin/inventory-reports"}
              />
            </div>
          </.expandable_section>

          <%!-- Sales & Payments --%>
          <.expandable_section
            title="Sales & Finance"
            section="sales"
            expanded={@expanded_sections["sales"]}
            count={5}
          >
            <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-3 pt-4">
              <.compact_card title="Orders" icon="hero-shopping-cart" navigate={~p"/admin/orders"} />
              <.compact_card title="Payments" icon="hero-banknotes" navigate={~p"/admin/payments"} />
              <.compact_card title="Economy" icon="hero-chart-pie" navigate={~p"/admin/economy"} />
              <.compact_card
                title="Statistics"
                icon="hero-chart-bar-square"
                navigate={~p"/admin/statistics"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="POHODA Export"
                icon="hero-arrow-down-tray"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pohoda-export"}
              />
            </div>
          </.expandable_section>

          <%!-- Other Tools --%>
          <.expandable_section
            title="Guest Management & Tools"
            section="other"
            expanded={@expanded_sections["other"]}
            count={5}
          >
            <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-3 pt-4">
              <.compact_card title="Guests" icon="hero-user-group" navigate={~p"/admin/guests"} />
              <.compact_card title="Rooms" icon="hero-home" navigate={~p"/admin/rooms"} />
              <.compact_card
                title="Bookings"
                icon="hero-calendar-days"
                navigate={~p"/admin/bookings"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Calendar"
                icon="hero-calendar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/bookings/calendar"}
              />
              <.compact_card
                title="Import Bookings"
                icon="hero-arrow-up-tray"
                navigate={~p"/admin/ical-import"}
              />
            </div>
          </.expandable_section>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    """
  end

  # Quick Action Card (Larger, more prominent)
  attr :title, :string, required: true
  attr :icon, :string, required: true
  attr :navigate, :string, required: true
  attr :color, :string, default: "blue"

  defp quick_action_card(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <.link
      navigate={@navigate}
      class="group block p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md hover:shadow-xl transform transition-all duration-200 hover:-translate-y-1 border-2 border-transparent hover:border-blue-500"
    >
      <div class="flex flex-col items-center text-center space-y-3">
        <div class="p-3 rounded-full bg-blue-100 group-hover:bg-blue-200 transition-colors">
          <.icon name={@icon} class="w-8 h-8 text-blue-600" />
        </div>
        <h3 class="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900">{@title}</h3>
      </div>
    </.link>
    """
  end

  # Expandable Section
  attr :title, :string, required: true
  attr :section, :string, required: true
  attr :expanded, :boolean, required: true
  attr :count, :integer, required: true
  slot :inner_block, required: true

  defp expandable_section(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm overflow-hidden">
      <button
        type="button"
        phx-click="toggle_section"
        phx-value-section={@section}
        class="w-full px-6 py-4 flex items-center justify-between hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
      >
        <div class="flex items-center gap-3">
          <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900">{@title}</h3>
          <span class="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 rounded-full">
            {@count}
          </span>
        </div>
        <.icon
          name={if @expanded, do: "hero-chevron-up", else: "hero-chevron-down"}
          class="w-5 h-5 text-gray-400"
        />
      </button>

      <div class={["px-6 pb-4", !@expanded && "hidden"]}>
        {render_slot(@inner_block)}
      </div>
    </div>
    """
  end

  # Compact Card (For collapsed sections)
  attr :title, :string, required: true
  attr :icon, :string, required: true
  attr :navigate, :string, required: true

  defp compact_card(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <.link
      navigate={@navigate}
      class="group flex items-center gap-3 p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-50 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-150"
    >
      <div class="p-2 rounded-lg bg-white group-hover:bg-blue-100 transition-colors">
        <.icon name={@icon} class="w-5 h-5 text-gray-600 group-hover:text-blue-600" />
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 group-hover:text-blue-700">{@title}</span>
    </.link>
    """
  end
end
````

## Option 2: **Workflow-Driven Tabs**
Organized by your actual work process: Bookings → Products → Everything Else.

````elixir
defmodule CozyCheckoutWeb.DashboardLiveV2 do
  use CozyCheckoutWeb, :live_view

  def mount(_params, _session, socket) do
    {:ok, assign(socket, :active_tab, "bookings")}
  end

  def handle_event("switch_tab", %{"tab" => tab}, socket) do
    {:noreply, assign(socket, :active_tab, tab)}
  end

  def render(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <div class="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-indigo-100">
      <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <%!-- Header --%>
        <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
          <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900">Admin Dashboard</h1>
          <.link
            navigate={~p"/"}
            class="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
          >
            <.icon name="hero-arrow-left" class="w-4 h-4" /> Back
          </.link>
        </div>

        <%!-- Tabs --%>
        <div class="mb-8 border-b border-gray-200">
          <nav class="flex gap-8">
            <.tab_button tab="bookings" active_tab={@active_tab} icon="hero-calendar-days">
              Bookings & Guests
            </.tab_button>
            <.tab_button tab="products" active_tab={@active_tab} icon="hero-cube">
              Products & Pricing
            </.tab_button>
            <.tab_button tab="operations" active_tab={@active_tab} icon="hero-chart-bar">
              Operations
            </.tab_button>
            <.tab_button tab="finance" active_tab={@active_tab} icon="hero-banknotes">
              Finance & Reports
            </.tab_button>
          </nav>
        </div>

        <%!-- Tab Content --%>
        <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
          <%= cond do %>
            <% @active_tab == "bookings" -> %>
              <.feature_card
                title="Bookings"
                description="Manage guest stays"
                icon="hero-calendar-days"
                navigate={~p"/admin/bookings"}
                badge="Primary"
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Calendar"
                description="Visual booking timeline"
                icon="hero-calendar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/bookings/calendar"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Guests"
                description="Guest database"
                icon="hero-user-group"
                navigate={~p"/admin/guests"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Rooms"
                description="Room management"
                icon="hero-home"
                navigate={~p"/admin/rooms"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Import Bookings"
                description="iCal import"
                icon="hero-arrow-up-tray"
                navigate={~p"/admin/ical-import"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Meal Planner"
                description="Plan weekly menus"
                icon="hero-clipboard-document-list"
                navigate={~p"/admin/meal-planner"}
              />
            <% @active_tab == "products" -> %>
              <.feature_card
                title="Products"
                description="Bar product catalog"
                icon="hero-cube"
                navigate={~p"/admin/products"}
                badge="Primary"
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Pricelists"
                description="Price & VAT management"
                icon="hero-currency-dollar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists"}
                badge="Primary"
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Categories"
                description="Product categories"
                icon="hero-tag"
                navigate={~p"/admin/categories"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Price Management"
                description="Validate pricing"
                icon="hero-chart-bar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists/management"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Print Pricelist"
                description="Printable menu"
                icon="hero-printer"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pricelists/print"}
              />
            <% @active_tab == "operations" -> %>
              <.feature_card
                title="Purchase Orders"
                description="Stock purchases"
                icon="hero-archive-box"
                navigate={~p"/admin/purchase_orders"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Stock Overview"
                description="Inventory levels"
                icon="hero-chart-bar"
                navigate={~p"/admin/stock"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Stock Adjustments"
                description="Record corrections"
                icon="hero-adjustments-horizontal"
                navigate={~p"/admin/stock-adjustments"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Inventory Reports"
                description="Profit analysis"
                icon="hero-chart-pie"
                navigate={~p"/admin/inventory-reports"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Orders"
                description="Bar orders"
                icon="hero-shopping-cart"
                navigate={~p"/admin/orders"}
              />
            <% @active_tab == "finance" -> %>
              <.feature_card
                title="Payments"
                description="Payment tracking"
                icon="hero-banknotes"
                navigate={~p"/admin/payments"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Economy"
                description="Revenue overview"
                icon="hero-chart-pie"
                navigate={~p"/admin/economy"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="Statistics"
                description="Sales analysis"
                icon="hero-chart-bar-square"
                navigate={~p"/admin/statistics"}
              />
              <.feature_card
                title="POHODA Export"
                description="Accounting export"
                icon="hero-arrow-down-tray"
                navigate={~p"/admin/pohoda-export"}
              />
            <% true -> %>
          <% end %>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    """
  end

  attr :tab, :string, required: true
  attr :active_tab, :string, required: true
  attr :icon, :string, required: true
  slot :inner_block, required: true

  defp tab_button(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <button
      type="button"
      phx-click="switch_tab"
      phx-value-tab={@tab}
      class={[
        "flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-3 font-medium text-sm border-b-2 transition-colors",
        @active_tab == @tab &&
          "border-blue-600 text-blue-700",
        @active_tab != @tab &&
          "border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300"
      ]}
    >
      <.icon name={@icon} class="w-5 h-5" />
      {render_slot(@inner_block)}
    </button>
    """
  end

  attr :title, :string, required: true
  attr :description, :string, required: true
  attr :icon, :string, required: true
  attr :navigate, :string, required: true
  attr :badge, :string, default: nil

  defp feature_card(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <.link
      navigate={@navigate}
      class="group block p-5 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-lg transform transition-all duration-200 hover:-translate-y-0.5 border border-gray-200 hover:border-blue-300"
    >
      <div class="flex flex-col h-full">
        <div class="flex items-start justify-between mb-3">
          <div class="p-2.5 rounded-lg bg-blue-50 group-hover:bg-blue-100 transition-colors">
            <.icon name={@icon} class="w-6 h-6 text-blue-600" />
          </div>
          <%= if @badge do %>
            <span class="px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 rounded-full">
              {@badge}
            </span>
          <% end %>
        </div>
        <h3 class="text-base font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1 group-hover:text-blue-700 transition-colors">
          {@title}
        </h3>
        <p class="text-sm text-gray-500">{@description}</p>
      </div>
    </.link>
    """
  end
end
````

## Option 3: **Search-First Dashboard**
Search bar + most-used shortcuts, everything else is searchable.

````elixir
defmodule CozyCheckoutWeb.DashboardLiveV3 do
  use CozyCheckoutWeb, :live_view

  @all_features [
    %{
      id: "bookings",
      title: "Bookings",
      description: "Manage guest bookings & stays",
      icon: "hero-calendar-days",
      path: ~p"/admin/bookings",

      icon: "hero-arrow-up-tray",
      path: ~p"/admin/ical-import",
      category: "Guests",
      frequent: false
    }
  ]

  def mount(_params, _session, socket) do
    {:ok,
     socket
     |> assign(:search_query, "")
     |> assign(:filtered_features, [])
     |> assign(:show_all, false)}
  end

  def handle_event("search", %{"query" => query}, socket) do
    filtered =
      if query == "" do
        []
      else
        query_lower = String.downcase(query)

        Enum.filter(@all_features, fn feature ->
          String.contains?(String.downcase(feature.title), query_lower) ||
            String.contains?(String.downcase(feature.description), query_lower) ||
            String.contains?(String.downcase(feature.category), query_lower)
        end)
        |> Enum.take(8)
      end

    {:noreply,
     socket
     |> assign(:search_query, query)
     |> assign(:filtered_features, filtered)}
  end

  def handle_event("toggle_all", _params, socket) do
    {:noreply, assign(socket, :show_all, !socket.assigns.show_all)}
  end

  def render(assigns) do
    ~H"""
    <div class="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-indigo-100">
      <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <%!-- Header --%>
        <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
          <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900">Admin Dashboard</h1>
          <.link
            navigate={~p"/"}
            class="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
          >
            <.icon name="hero-arrow-left" class="w-4 h-4" /> Back
          </.link>
        </div>

        <%!-- Search Bar --%>
        <div class="mb-8 relative">
          <div class="relative">
            <.icon name="hero-magnifying-glass" class="absolute left-4 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-5 h-5 text-gray-400" />
            <input
              type="text"
              name="query"
              value={@search_query}
              phx-change="search"
              placeholder="Search features... (e.g., 'bookings', 'prices', 'stock')"
              class="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-4 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200 transition-all"
              autocomplete="off"
            />
          </div>

          <%!-- Search Results Dropdown --%>
          <%= if @search_query != "" && @filtered_features != [] do %>
            <div class="absolute z-10 w-full mt-2 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-xl border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden">
              <div :for={feature <- @filtered_features}>
                <.link
                  navigate={feature.path}
                  class="block px-4 py-3 hover:bg-blue-50 transition-colors border-b border-gray-100 last:border-0"
                >
                  <div class="flex items-center gap-3">
                    <div class="p-2 rounded-lg bg-blue-50">
                      <.icon name={feature.icon} class="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600" />
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex-1">
                      <div class="font-medium text-gray-900">{feature.title}</div>
                      <div class="text-sm text-gray-500">{feature.description}</div>
                    </div>
                    <span class="text-xs text-gray-400">{feature.category}</span>
                  </div>
                </.link>
              </div>
            </div>
          <% end %>
        </div>

        <%!-- Quick Access --%>
        <div class="mb-8">
          <h2 class="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wide mb-4">
            Quick Access
          </h2>
          <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
            <%= for feature <- Enum.filter(@all_features, & &1.frequent) do %>
              <.link
                navigate={feature.path}
                class="group block p-5 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-lg transform transition-all duration-200 hover:-translate-y-1 border-2 border-transparent hover:border-blue-500"
              >
                <div class="flex flex-col items-center text-center space-y-3">
                  <div class="p-3 rounded-full bg-blue-100 group-hover:bg-blue-200 transition-colors">
                    <.icon name={feature.icon} class="w-7 h-7 text-blue-600" />
                  </div>
                  <h3 class="text-base font-bold text-gray-900 group-hover:text-blue-700 transition-colors">
                    {feature.title}
                  </h3>
                </div>
              </.link>
            <% end %>
          </div>
        </div>

        <%!-- Show All Features Toggle --%>
        <div class="text-center">
          <button
            type="button"
            phx-click="toggle_all"
            class="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all text-gray-700 font-medium"
          >
            <%= if @show_all do %>
              <.icon name="hero-chevron-up" class="w-5 h-5" /> Hide all features
            <% else %>
              <.icon name="hero-chevron-down" class="w-5 h-5" /> Show all features
            <% end %>
          </button>
        </div>

        <%!-- All Features (when expanded) --%>
        <%= if @show_all do %>
          <div class="mt-8 space-y-6">
            <%= for {category, features} <- Enum.group_by(@all_features, & &1.category) do %>
              <div>
                <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3">{category}</h3>
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-3">
                  <%= for feature <- features do %>
                    <.link
                      navigate={feature.path}
                      class="group flex items-center gap-3 p-3 bg-white rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-50 hover:shadow-md transition-all"
                    >
                      <div class="p-2 rounded-lg bg-gray-50 group-hover:bg-blue-100 transition-colors">
                        <.icon name={feature.icon} class="w-5 h-5 text-gray-600 group-hover:text-blue-600" />
                      </div>
                      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 group-hover:text-blue-700">
                        {feature.title}
                      </span>
                    </.link>
                  <% end %>
                </div>
              </div>
            <% end %>
          </div>
        <% end %>
      </div>
    </div>
    """
  end
end
````

---

## **Which One Works Best?**

| Layout | Best For | Pros | Cons |
|--------|----------|------|------|
| **Option 1: Priority + Collapsible** | Users who focus on 4-5 tasks daily | Clean, reduces clutter, easy to scan | Requires clicks to access less-used features |
| **Option 2: Workflow Tabs** | Task-switching between related areas | Logical grouping, familiar pattern | Must remember which tab has what |
| **Option 3: Search-First** | Power users, varied workflows | Fastest access, no memorization needed | Search requires typing (slower on tablet) |

**My recommendation for your case:** **Option 1** (Priority + Collapsible)
- Your 4 most-used features are always visible
- Rest are organized but hidden by default
- Works great on tablets (big touch targets)
- Reduces cognitive load

Which layout resonates with you? Or would you like me to create a hybrid combining elements from multiple options?
